item.title: Attend our complimentary business risk management workshop in August
item.description:
Temple University is offering a complimentary workshop in Singapore focusing on risk management for businesses. Led by Professor Michael Hubbel, Professor Emeritus at Olivet College, the workshop will cover how to anticipate and plan for unexpected losses. Professor Hubbel, who also holds faculty positions at the Fox School of Business at Temple University and the Tobin School of Business at St. John’s University, will delve into the enterprise risk management process, common business risks, and essential risk management goals, tools, and techniques...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/attend-our-complimentary-business-risk-management-workshop-in-august/
